text: During the 2008–09 German football season, Hamburger SV competed in the Bundesliga. ==Season summary== Hamburg finished fifth, eight points off first. They also made it to the semi-finals of the DFB-Pokal and the UEFA Cup, but were beaten by Werder Bremen in both competitions, on penalties and away goals respectively. ==Players== ===First-team squad=== :Squad at end of seasonhttp://www.footballsquads.co.uk/ger/2008-2009/bundes/hamburg.htm ===Left club during season=== ==Transfers== ===In=== ===Out=== * Otto Addo - retired ==Results== ===Bundesliga=== ===UEFA Cup=== ====First round==== Hamburg won 2–0 on aggregate. ====Group stage==== ====Round of 32==== Hamburg won 4–0 on aggregate. ====Round of 16==== Hamburg won 4–3 on aggregate. ====Quarter- finals==== Hamburg won 4–3 on aggregate. ====Semi-finals==== Werder Bremen 3–3 Hamburg on aggregate. Werder Bremen won on away goals. ==References== ==Notes== Hamburger SV Category:Hamburger SV seasons
title: 2008–09 Hamburger SV season
